text: Ernest Lee Fletcher (born November 12, 1952) is an American physician and politician. In 1998, he was elected to the first of three terms in the United States House of Representatives. He resigned in 2003 after being elected the 60th Governor of Kentucky and served until 2007. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==Other websites== * * Follow the MoneyErnie Fletcher & Stephen B Pence 2006 campaign contributions * == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American physicians Category:Governors of Kentucky Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Ernie Fletcher
